list.name: provider
list.label: Provider
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT provider AS __text, provider AS __value FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily ORDER BY provider

list.name: team_id
list.label: Team
list.query: SELECT id AS __value, name AS __text FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'unassigned' AS __value, 'Unassigned' AS __text ORDER BY __text

list.name: work_scope_id
list.label: Work Scope
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT work_scope_id AS __text, work_scope_id AS __value FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE work_scope_id != '' ORDER BY work_scope_id

panels.title: Defect Introduction Rate
panels.description: Ratio of new bugs to total new items created daily.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, sum(new_bugs) / nullIf(sum(new_items), 0) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, work_scope_id, argMax(new_bugs_count, computed_at) AS new_bugs, argMax(new_items_count, computed_at) AS new_items FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, team_id, work_scope_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: WIP Congestion Ratio
panels.description: WIP Count / Weekly Throughput. Measures how 'stuffed' the pipeline is relative to delivery speed.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, avg(congestion_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, provider, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, work_scope_id, argMax(wip_congestion_ratio, computed_at) AS congestion_latest FROM stats.work_item_metrics_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, provider, team_id, work_scope_id ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day

panels.title: Burnout Risk: Weekend Workdays
panels.description: Total number of users active on weekends per day.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, 'Weekend Active Users' AS metric, sum(weekend_days_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, author_email, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(weekend_days, computed_at) AS weekend_days_latest FROM stats.user_metrics_daily WHERE match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) AND weekend_days > 0 GROUP BY day, author_email, team_id ) GROUP BY day ORDER BY day

panels.title: Bottleneck Index (Avg WIP per Status)
panels.description: Average number of items in each status (Total Duration / 24h). High values indicate bottlenecks.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, status AS metric, avg(avg_wip_latest) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, status, provider, work_scope_id, ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned') AS team_id, argMax(avg_wip, computed_at) AS avg_wip_latest FROM stats.work_item_state_durations_daily WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, status, provider, work_scope_id, team_id ) GROUP BY day, status ORDER BY day

panels.title: Flow Efficiency
panels.description: Active Time / Total Lead Time. Higher is better. Measures how much of the time spent was actually working versus waiting.

targets.rawSql: SELECT day AS time, provider AS metric, avg(efficiency) AS value FROM ( SELECT day, work_item_id, provider, argMax(flow_efficiency, computed_at) as efficiency FROM stats.work_item_cycle_times WHERE match(provider, '${provider:regex}') AND match(ifNull(nullIf(team_id, ''), 'unassigned'), '${team_id:regex}') AND match(work_scope_id, '${work_scope_id:regex}') AND day >= toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__from, 1000))) AND day < toDate(toDateTime(intDiv($__to, 1000))) GROUP BY day, work_item_id, provider ) GROUP BY day, provider ORDER BY day
